title: Track Fault on Circle Line Leading to Delays

title_translations.zh-Hans: 环线轨道故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Jejak Kerosakan di Laluan Bulat Menyebabkan Kelewatan

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train services from #PayaLebar towards #MacPherson are now operating normally.
[CCL]: Estimate 5 mins additional travelling time from #PayaLebar to #MacPherson towards HarbourFront due to track fault.
[CCL]: Estimate 3 mins additional travelling time from #PayaLebar to #MacPherson towards HarbourFront due to track fault.
